main event: A witness observed a bright light-green object hovering over a ploughed field in Bastrop, Texas, which then shot up into the sky.
interesting points: The object was approximately 40 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for about 10 to 12 minutes., The object moved silently and very fast., The object was visible behind trees during the observation., Multiple personnel at Perrin Air Force Base also reported a bright unidentified object on 8 June 1964.
witness description: Mr. Mason Jr, AFSC, from Bastrop, Texas
